jd: From: Prashant Jha, Tek Inspirations LLC prashant.jha@tekinspirations.com Reply to: prashant.jha@tekinspirations.com Job Description -Role : Sr. Front end Developer Location : Austin, TX onsite (must be local to Austin, TX) Required: Resume should be at most 4 pages long! Please provide updated resume, full legal name, visa status, rate, and current location. least 13+ years of experience no less. Candidate must meet the minimum requirements, or they will not be considered! Required Skills: Must have 13+ yrs. of experience in web programming for enhancing user experience and performance using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.Must have 13+ yrs. of experience with functional automation/performance automation of the API’s and Web Services, and web applications using C# .Net Framework, MVC, and SQL Server.Must have 13+ yrs. of experience with computer programming at the senior level.Must have 13+ yrs. of experience with design and development of web based and window-based applications by using multiple .Net HTML, HTML5, ASP.NET (Blazor)/C# front-end/back-end technologies.Must have 13+ yrs. of experience with Azure Dev Ops or AWS Dev Ops.Must have 13+ yrs. of experience developing web applications using C#, JavaScript, and SQL.Must have 13+ yrs. of experience with working in an agile based development environment and participating in scrum sessions.
